text: @Mike_Pence LOOK!  It's the Devil in Sheep's Clothing!!  Mexico is paying for the wall,Anyone who wants a test can get a testYou are going to get better health care at a lower cost, Clean Coal, Like a miracle, The Coronavirus will disappear.  It's OK to knowingly & willfully lie to the FBI!!
